description:
FaceGoo is a fun photo app that allows you to stretch, pinch and twist your photos in crazy ways! Use it to make your friends look silly or your enemies look fat. You can even add funny stickers to your photos to make them even more outrageous. 

Interested in FaceGoo but not sure if you want to spend the money? Try FaceGoo Lite! Then upgrade to the full version to enable saving screenshots, uploading to Facebook and to enjoy an advertising-free experience.

Check it out, and you'll be amazed at how much fun it is to play with FaceGoo!

----------

* FaceGoo is by far the best invention ever.
LInWonderland

* Awesome for a buck
I'mNotZach

* FaceGoo is my new fav iPhone app - take a look. 
mzcher

----------

Welcome to FaceGoo 8 - The most magic release of FaceGoo yet!
* Magic Stickers - With one click, FaceGoo will add a set of funny stickers to your image. Click again and again for constant laughs! 
* Postcards - Send *real* postcards of your Goo to friends and family! 
* Stickers - we've added lots of awesome new purchasable stickers to the app. 
* New Design - We've reimagined FaceGoo with a beautiful new design. It's now easier to use and we keep all your previous Goo's around. 
* FatGoo - Make your Goo even more hilarious by sending it to FatGoo, where you can apply funny face morphs instantly! 
* Goo of the Week - Every week we'll show you the best Goo shared by our awesome users. 

----------

Key Features:
- Pinch and distort pictures. Play with a photo as if it were elastic.
- Pick from included sample pictures, your own pictures or from IPhone camera.
- Add funny stickers to your pictures and Goo the stickers as part of the picture.
- Upload screenshots to Facebook and Twitter, or send via email (available in paid version of FaceGoo).
- Draw messages on your Goo using the new Pen tool. 

How to use FaceGoo:
- Choose a picture from the Photo Library or use of the included sample photos.
- Use up to four fingers to pinch, push, or twist your Goo.

How to use Stickers:
- Pinch the sticker with two fingers to resize and rotate it.
- Tap outside the sticker to deselect. It can then be Gooed like the rest of the picture.
- Double-tap a sticker to reselect it.

How to Undo your Goo:
- Shake your iPhone/iPod to undo all your Goo changes and remove any stickers.

----------

If you like FatGoo, FatBooth, Squeeze It, Wobble or Face Melter, you'll love FaceGoo!

Languages:
English, Chinese, Japanese, Italian, French, German, Spanish, Danish, Russian, Korean

FaceGoo is made by Springy LLC. Keep an eye out for our upcoming apps!
